extendedInfo.description: Book of Mormon Touch brings scripture stories to life with imaginative and interactive storytelling designed for early readers (primary-aged children) and LDS families. With original illustrations and careful attention to scriptural story, young children and beginning readers can interact and engage with familiar characters and important stories from The Book of Mormon (The Book of Mormon is a volume of scripture published by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, or Mormons).***Download and enjoy the first story for FREE now!***STORY MODE helps primary children (age 3-11) engage with the scriptures line by line with dozens of illustrated scenes. Each scene includes interactive sounds and pop-up messages that will surprise and delight young readers and non-readers alike.STICKER STORY MODE builds memory skills challenging children to place illustrated characters and objects where they belong within each scene as they follow the scripture story.BUILD-A-SCENE MODE encourages children to create scenes from other Book of Mormon stories or to imagine their own stories using the backgrounds and illustrations from the app. (Build-a-Scene also includes a few surprise stickers and illustrations not found in regular story modes.)NOTE: Book of Mormon Touch is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Later-day Saints.

reviews.title: Great interactive app
reviews.comment: Perfect for a reward for good behavior during sacrament meeting! Can\'t wait for more content!
reviews.author: R. Ekitzel Wood

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open after installing
reviews.comment: I uninstalled and reinstalled but it doesn\'t open. Too bad because I\'m a primary teacher and I won\'t be able to share this :-(
reviews.author: Analyn Trinidad

reviews.title: Worth it!
reviews.comment: This is the first story of the Book of Mormon app that is so nice and fun! This version is improvised and better than the one before. And, there\'s narrative function too! Enjoy using it with the nursery kids!
reviews.author: Jeremy Hunt

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is just brilliant, lets share it with our friends!
reviews.author: Harry Zorrilla

reviews.title: Excellent app. Excellent update.
reviews.comment: My kids love this app. I love the new narration option in the update. I definitely recommend this app. It\'s worth the money. I can\'t wait for the next volume! I will purchase as many volumes as they produce. It\'s nice to have good quality wholesome games for my kids to play.
reviews.author: Jaimie Nebeker

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: I used to love this game, but after I updated it, it won\'t load anymore. When I open it, it just sits there with the little circle going round and round forever.
reviews.author: Alicia Larsen Joslin

reviews.title: My toddler LOVES this \"game.\"
reviews.comment: He plays for hours. The read-along update is great! The only issue I have is that I purchsed vol. 2 on my phone and now I can\'t buy it on my tablet because the play store says I already own it.
reviews.author: Travis Pierson

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Not terribly interesting for me but if my kids were older I could see this being fun for them. I kept exiting when I tried to just go back to the menu, kinda frustrating.
reviews.author: Curtis Evans

reviews.title: Cute app!
reviews.comment: From what I\'ve seen so far, this is a really cool app.  I love the interactive graphics!
reviews.author: Susan Thomas

reviews.title: Good app, but needs work
reviews.comment: I find it extremely annoying that every time I hit the back button on my device, it exits the program instead of going back one level. Fix this, PLEASE. Other wise, a decent app.
reviews.author: Brian Hickman

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Great graphics. Moooar!
reviews.author: jimmy green

reviews.comment: LOVE THIS APP.
reviews.author: Bryce Johnson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Absolutely perfect!
reviews.author: Eric Jahnke

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Good work people. Love the new content.
reviews.author: Nathan Turner

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: Entertaining please do more!
reviews.author: Nathan Stoddard

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.comment: This is great for my kids! Good wholesome fun!
reviews.author: Melissa Hathaway

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The option to read to the kids is great.
reviews.author: Shellyce Keyes

reviews.title: This is just great for our kids
reviews.comment: Children just love this app to study the scriptures in a fun way. Great job guys.
reviews.author: Jackie Hernandez

reviews.title: False pretense
reviews.comment: Give me the full price upfront. :-)
reviews.author: Venice O\'Brien

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1
reviews.author: abish barata
